name: Another Brick Breaker
description:
Another Brick Breaker is obviously a brick breaker game as you can imagine. 

This is the first game that I publish. I hope to have many reviews to ensure the quality of my next projects.

  • 50 levels.
  • Somes bricks contains bonus, catch them to have benefits. Benefits disappeared after of level except for money, missile and bomb.
  • Between levels, you have shop menu to upgrade your bat and weapons.
  • If you lose or leave a level, you lose all your money and yours lives is restored to "maximum. Yours weapons and upgrades are keeped.
  • Warning ! On boss levels bonus goes to the last bat that hit the ball.
  • For boss levels 20 and 50, the ai bat has color and ball take the color of the last brick hitten. Maybe its important.
  • For boss levels 30 and 50, the level never stops and loops until you beat the boss.
  • From level 20, bricks on boss levels appears regularly.
  • Every 10 level, its a boss level. You must play a pong match with an ai player.
  • Each 10 levels, a new game play appears.
  • Level 1 to 10, classic levels.
  • Level 11 to 20, color levels. Color brick appears and need 2 hits to destroy, 6 for armored.
  • Level 21 to 30, long levels. Level moves as a 'shoot'em up' and new bricks are revealed.
  • Don't worry, level stops until you breaks bricks.
  • Level 31 to 40, puzzle levels. Levels can contains walls, warps and door/key brick.
  • Level 41 to 50, final levels. Levels size up and can have all game play seen before.
